q: The agreement with Nokia could bring Windows Phone the scale the platform needs. "The Windows Phone platform, like any other, will only thrive with scale and with variety," Steve Ballmer said. We will work with our partners to bring their innovations more rapidly into our platform while also working to ensure their innovation doesn't lead to the kind of fragmentation for developers that other platforms are currently experiencing. Ed Miliband , the leader of the opposition Labor Party, said David Cameron had made a mistake in keeping Andy Coulson on the job even as damaging accusations continued to swirl around him. and see what hatches!" he tells another. That's apparently his version of a compliment. Toby Young remains amused by the idea that Americans need a mean Brit to tell it like it is. It's funny because 75 years ago Americans had a reputation for being honest and plainspoken, while Brits were thought to be mealy-mouthed and obsessed with propriety, says Toby Young . "It's as if we've switched places." But with Simon Cowell gone, who's going to judge our nation of underachievers? Contests: You could be a winner!
